home.title: GET A MEMORABLE VISUAL IDENTITY
home.description: Elevate the Value of your brand and business through an authentic and exclusive design.

about.description_1: Drop is a design studio focused on developing authentic projects, making your brand exclusive and memorable.
about.description_2: “Drop”, a keyword that must be taken into account before starting any creation process, whether it is a visual identity, campaign or even a simple post. Let go of our fears, anxiety and expectations, focusing only on delivering a unique project that meets the client's needs.

budget.section-description-one: Complete the online form and receive your
budget.section-description-two: budget in a simpler, quicker and easier way.

form.title: Request your quote by filling in the fields below

job_wanting.description: Why do you need this project? What are your goals?

visual_identity.title: Visual Identity - In addition to the logo, check the items for your project below

papers.want: I want to receive the pieces only in digital format
papers.dontwant: I want to receive the printed items by order

form.message_extra: Do you still have something to say? Please feel free to contribute with other information.
